data.title: BALI HALF DAY TOUR PACKAGE
data.tagline: BALI HALF DAY TOUR PACKAGE IS BALI SHORT DAY TOURS EXPERIENCE TO VISIT TOURISM SITE IN BALI ISLANDS
data.description: Bali Half Day Tour Package is an Bali Short Day Tour Experience to Enjoy Visiting the Amazing Tourist Destination in Half Day, enjoy the Bali Half Day Tours around 5 till 6 hours during your holiday in Bali. This Half Day Tour Package will be accompanied by our professional Bali Tour team will guiding you to visit the beautiful panorama of tourist sites and other tourist destinations by performing their outstanding service together for your satisfaction and enjoyable during half day trip. This Bali Short Day Tours Experience is perfect choice for those don't have time much during holiday, but want to explore the beauty of Bali Islands, this packages is the perfect choice for you short trip experience in Bali. Below is Bali Half Day Tours Package we designed and already do selection which site is the best to visit in short trip with calculation of time visit and the length of the trip, in result we can make the best short trip morning or afternoon for you to choose. During the tours if you don't like the site you can ask the driver to skip and change to another site, our driver always ready to give the amazing services and always ready to answer your question about tourism site we visit and other information about adventure activity. Our Bali Half Day Tours experience is the best short trip package for your holiday, we will keep put some new interesting short day tour package, so you can have many option to choose for make your holiday unforgettable one

title.title: Half Day Ubud Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package

image.title: Half Day Ubud Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package | Bali Golden Tour

description.html: Half Day Ubud Tour is a Bali Half Day Tour Package and one of the most famous Bali Tour in bali for a short trip to visit interesting places in Ubud such as Celuk Village for Silver Art, Batuan Village for Painting Art, Batuan Temple and Ubud Monkey Forest. The half day tours is very exciting to explore the traditional village with it social activities and culture from the local community. It is wonderful trip to the Balinese life.

title.title: Half Day Uluwatu Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package

image.title: Half Day Uluwatu Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package | Bali Golden Tour

description.html: Half Day Uluwatu Tour is an Bali Half Day Tour Package and exiting trip to visit Uluwatu Temple, the most famous balinese temple in the south part with breathtaking view of sunset. This short Bali Half day Tours package is combined with the spectacular Balinese traditional dance performance of Kecak Dance and to enjoy the delicious seafood dinner at Jimbaran Beach. Our driver is always offer best tour services.

title.title: Half Day Tanah Lot Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package

image.title: Half Day Tanah Lot Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package | Bali Golden Tour

description.html: Half Day Tanah Lot Tour is a Bali Half Day Tour Package to visit Tanah Lot Temple, the most popular tourist destinations in Bali with breathtaking view of sunset . the tour will be visit taman ayun temple is mother temple of mengwi village, is beautiful temple with big fish pond surrounds and visit tanah lot temple is Balinese Hindu temple and the function as sea temple, located in the sea with breathtaking view sunset

title.title: Bali Ubud Waterfall Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package

image.title: Bali Ubud Waterfall Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package | Bali Golden Tour

description.html: Bali Ubud Waterfall Tour is a Bali Half Day Tour Package to by allowed you to encounter with the hidden waterfall of Tegenungan waterfall in Ubud village. Beside the waterfall also we will discover other tourist destination worth to visit. Is great opportunity to know about the Ubud Waterfall with name Tegenungan Waterfall. The duration this trip is half day by visit the Tegenungan Waterfall first at Kemenuh, This waterfall has height 35 meter.

title.title: Bali Denpasar City Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package

image.title: Bali Denpasar City Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package | Bali Golden Tour

description.html: Bali Denpasar City Tour is a Bali Half Day Tour Package to visit Denpasar town with it unique and variety of local society life combines with the traditional Balinese culture activities. This short half day tours is very interesting that you can see closely the real Balinese urban with their social life and traditional cultures. This is a half day tour to visit the beauty of tourism in the capital of the Bali of Denpasar, experience to know more about city of Denpasar.

title.title: Bali Shopping Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package

image.title: Bali Shopping Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package | Bali Golden Tour

description.html: Bali Shopping Tour is a Bali Half Day Tour Package to visit balinese traditional art shop. We will pick up at your hotel in morning and then directly to the Tohpati Village for see the amazing and beautiful batik textile art, then continue to visit Celuk Village see the traditional making gold and silver art, then continue to visit Batuan Village for painting art and see the process making traditional painting by local painter here and then visiting Mas Village for wood carving art

title.title: Bali Beach Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package

image.title: Bali Beach Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package | Bali Golden Tour

description.html: Bali Beach Tour is a Bali Half Day Tour Package to Visit some of the famous and beautiful white sand beach in Bali Islands. Is a half day tour to visit the beach with its beautiful white sand and clear water, a tour that may be specifically for those of you who really like to travel to the beach whether it's for swimming, sunbathing or just enjoying the beach view with a gentle beach breeze will make the sensation become very comfortable and memorable

title.title: Bali Ubud Tanah Lot Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package
title.html: Bali Ubud and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Bali Ubud Tanah Lot Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package | Bali Golden Tour

description.html: Bali Ubud and Tanah Lot Tour is a Bali Half Day Tour Package to visit two beautiful tourism site in bali, The short trip will visit Batuan Village for Fine Art, visit the famous site of Ubud Monkey forest at Ubud Village and see the stunning view of sunset at Tanah Lot Temple and visit other interesting site. The half day tours will bring you to the wonderful memory with memorable experiences. Our professional tour driver is always outstanding offer best tour services

title.title: Bali Ubud Uluwatu Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package

image.title: Bali Ubud Uluwatu Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package | Bali Golden Tour

description.html: Bali Ubud and Uluwatu Tour is a Bali Half Day Tour Package to visit two beautiful tourism site in bali and then enjoy fresh seafood dinner at jimbaran bay. The short trip will visit Ubud Monkey Forest, and then on the way to Uluwatu Temple we will stop by at Batuan Village to see Beautifull Fine art made by Local people at batuan village. After that we will visiting Uluwatu Temple or known as a rock cliff Temple due the location on the 70-meter-high cliff.

title.title: Bali Uluwatu Tanah Lot Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package
title.html: Bali Uluwatu and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Bali Uluwatu Tanah Lot Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package | Bali Golden Tour

description.html: Bali Uluwatu and Tanah Lot Tour is a Bali Half Day Tour Package to visit two beautiful temple in Bali Islands. The short trip will visit Tanah Lot Temple or known as a Sea Temple and then visiting Uluwatu Temple or known as a rock cliff Temple due the location of the temple is on the 70-meter-high cliff protruding above Indonesian Ocean and also place for monkey habitat near the temple. Then we will watching Kecak Dance Performance then seafood dinner at Jimbaran

title.title: Bali Denpasar Ubud Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package

image.title: Bali Denpasar Ubud Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package | Bali Golden Tour

description.html: Bali Denpasar Ubud Tour is Bali Half Day Tour Packages we created to allowed you to explore the Denpasar town capital city of Bali and explore the beauty tourist destination in Ubud Village. Is great way to explore two most popular regency with different unique tourist destination will be visit. This tour will visit the Bajra Sandhi Monument in denpasar city, then visiting tegalalang rice terrace in ubud village, then visiting ubud monkey forest at tropical forest in center of ubud town

title.title: Bali Denpasar Tanah Lot Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package
title.html: Bali Denpasar and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Bali Denpasar Tanah Lot Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package | Bali Golden Tour

description.html: Bali Denpasar Tanah Lot Tour is Bali Half Day Tour Packages we make to make your day more impressive by offer Visiting Tourism Site in Denpasar City and then Visiting Tanah Lot Temple. We created something different from other tour company by offer you to visiting two famous regency which is Denpasar City and Tabanan Village. The short half day tour will visit Bajra Sandhi Monument in denpasar town, then visiting taman ayun temple and last is visit Tanah Lot Temple for sunset.

title.title: Bali Denpasar Uluwatu Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package

image.title: Bali Denpasar Uluwatu Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package | Bali Golden Tour

description.html: Bali Denpasar Uluwatu Tour is Bali Half Day Tour Packages we Designed for you to Enjoy Visiting Denpasar City Tourist Destination and then Visiting Uluwatu Temple and other interesting places. This short half day tours is great journey we created to make your holiday full of joy and having a wonderful memory. The journey will start to visit the Bajra Sandhi Monument, Uluwatu Temple, Watching Kecak and Fire Dance Performance and Enjoy Dinner at Jimbaran Beach

title.title: Bali Ubud Nights Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package

image.title: Bali Ubud Nights Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package | Bali Golden Tour

description.html: Bali Ubud Nights Tour is Bali Half Day Tour Packages is a tour that we offer to enjoy the beautiful even day in ubud village by visiting tourist destinations such as ubud monkey forest, saraswati temple and watching legong dance in ubud village and ending with enjoying dinner in ubud village. It is a very impressive experience to spend the night in Ubud village by seeing a very famous tourist destination and watching a very graceful traditional dance

title.title: Bali Nusa Dua Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package

image.title: Bali Nusa Dua Tour | Bali Half Day Tours Package | Bali Golden Tour

description.html: Bali Nusa Dua Tour is Bali Half Day Tour Packages to visit the tourist destination in Nusa Dua Village with all its natural beauty and very interesting cultural park, very suitable for those of you who want a short tour to visit tourist destinations close to the city, maybe this is an option for those of you who want a half day city tour in Nusa Dua, in this half day tour we will visit Water Blow Nusa Dua, Pandawa Beach and Garuda Wisnu Kencana Cultural Park
